projects.title: Personal Website
projects.description: A website to record my journey as a first gen college student. At the same time, showcasing my projects and my capability of doing web development. Features: About me, Resume, Projects, Contact Form.

projects.title: Project Clean
projects.description: A website to report school maintenance issues, there's 2 type of authorizations. User can login as a student/professor to report or login as a staff to fix the issue. Features: Multi-user authourization and live time updates.

projects.title: Cravers Pizza
projects.description:
A fun project I made for web development class I took at Hunter College. This is a website for a pizza restaruant that showcast pizzas they have with the price. 
 Features: slideshow, add to cart, checkout calculation.
